messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Hello crew, I would like to declare today isss memorial day for all minersss lossst due to the epedemic of ssspace time dissstortionsss.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: This is not yor captain speaking.  Due to the untimely demise of my one and only brother I must end this meaningful existance that is life.
